column5: Did any one else pick up the floater jacket that CTC had on sale last week. It seemed like a descent buy so I picked up one for myself and one for my son. They were on for around a $100 usually $199.They are the Nautilus NC700 model, does any one have any input into this model good or bad.
Well you bought a product that is made right here in Guelph,the company makes that model and also Bouy o boy suits also. Good deal found and a good product.  Ken

I don't have that particular model, but I do own a Mustang Bomber jacket and have enjoyed wearing it for a number of years. Only complaint I'd have with it was the hood, or should I say the lack there of, until I ordered one in. Still, it's just a nylon shell of a hood, but it does brake the wind. HH
i grabbed a full helly hansen suit just for the added warmth.
Thanks for the replies guys, headhunter the model I picked up has the nylon hood right in the collar.
